localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

It is a game to assort a jewel flowing from the left.
Judgement and instantaneous power are tried.

Package size: 31 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Japanese

Syouzaemon

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

It is a game to assort a jewel flowing from the left.
Judgement and instantaneous power are tried.

Package size: 31 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Japanese

Syouzaemon

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

このコンテンツはAndroid™端末非対応です。

左から流れてくる宝石を仕分けるゲームです。
判断力と瞬発力が試されます。

コンテンツ容量: 31 MB

プレイ人数: 1人

対応機能:
- コントローラーまたは、オンスクリーンコントローラー

対応言語:
英語(アメリカ)/英語(イギリス)/日本語

著作権等:
Syouzaemon

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
